description.en: 1.Circuit components2.Circuit characteristics3.Network equations4.Steady state analysis and frequency response5.Network Functions: poles and zeros6.Two-port network analysis7.Fourier and laplace transform

name.zh: 系統雛形與軟硬體設計
name.en: System Prototyping and Hardware Software Design

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使學生學習利用FPGA系統來完成一個系之設計與驗證的方法，同時在系設計過程了解如何從系統規格之下做軟硬體的分割，進而學習系統之軟體及硬體之設計技術，系統設計的功能之正確性的驗證方法也將在本課程中探考。本課程之大綱如下所示：1.系統設計簡介2.系統雛型平台3.系統軟硬體分割技術4.FPGA系統之嵌入式處理器5.系統軟體設計6.系統硬體設計7.系統整合及仿效8.系統功能驗證9.設計實例
description.en: The goal of this course is that the students will learn a system design and verification methodology under a provided system protoyping platform. First, the system partitioning techniques will be applied from given a system specification. Then, system hardware and software design method base on FPGA systems will be implemented and studies,respectively. Finally, System functional verification techniques will be discussed. The outline of this course are shown as follows:1.Introduction to System Design Methodology 2.System Prototyping Platform 3.Hardware-Software Partitioning Techniques 4.Embedded Processor in FPGA system 5.Software Design for Embedded Processor of FPGA Based Systems 6.Hardware Design for FPGA Based Systems 7.System Integrated and Emulation 8.System Functional Verification 9.Design Case Study.

description.zh: 1.導論2.無失真壓縮技術3.量化與轉換編碼4.動作估計與動作補償5.MPEG視訊編碼標準6.視訊編碼在傳輸時的考量7.無線傳播通道8.無線通訊系統之數位調變技術9.無線通訊系統之通道編碼技術10.多重路徑衰落通道之應對技術11.無線多媒體通訊系統與標準
description.en: 1.Introductions 2.Entropy coding 3.Rate-distortion theory and quantization 4.Motion compensation and Interframe coding5.MPEG video coding 6.Multimedia transmission 7.Wireless propagation channels 8.Digital modulation in wireless systems 9.Channel coding in wireless systems 10.Schemes to overcome multipath fading 11.Standards of wireless multimedia communication systems

name.zh: 功率控制積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計功率控制積體電路設計,進而能培養學生具有設計功率控制積體電路設計的能力,課程內容包含： 1. 介紹 2. 被動元件 3. 功率開關 4. 交流-直流電源轉換  5. 直流-交流電源轉換6. 交流-交流電源轉換7 偏壓電路 8. 運算放大器 9. 參考電路 10. 邏輯控制電路 11. 電流感測電路 12. 保護電路 13. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power control integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power control integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Passive components 3. Power switches 4.AC-DC power conversion 5. DC-AC conversion 6. AC-AC conversion 7. Bias circuits 8. Operational amplifiers 9. Reference circuits 10. Logic control circuits 11. Current sensing circuits 12. Protection circuits 13. Case study

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1.傳輸線原理，2.高頻元件，3.散射參數，4.史密斯圖應用，5.小信號放大器，6.低雜訊放大器，7.射頻放大器，8.振盪器，9.混波與檢波，10.功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 蛋白質體學工程學，是結合蛋白質生化技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於蛋白質生化技術的快速發展，蛋白質序列的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。蛋白質體工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Proteomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from protein biochemistry and computational technology. Biochemistry techniques in high speed screening such 2D gel and mass-spectrometry have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Proteomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 整合電腦輔助設計軟體與輔助製造軟體之使用，採專案研究方式實際演練CAD/CAM，同時介紹RP(快速成形模型)之技術，以說明從設計到製造等一貫化作業。(本課程以Pro-Engineer,MasterCAM,SmartCAM等軟體為例)
description.en: In this course we integrate the use of computer aided design software and computer aided manufacture software, by taking project research methods to practice CAD/CAM in real, and introduce the techniques of Rapid Prototyping(RP)to illustrate the processes from desigh to manufacture.(In this course we take Pro-Engineer, Master CAM, Smart CAM as examples)

description.zh: 研究市場趨勢與消費者之購買習性、需求及消費心理等之相關性以利設計策略之訂定及產品之開發方向。
description.en: The study of market trend and consumer purchasing behavior, demand and consumer psychology to propose the design strategy and development direction.

description.zh: 本課程針對網際服務應用軟體(Web-based Applications)特性，透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生有效統合軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、與技術，以建立網際服務軟體工程程序(Web-based software engineering process)，開發高品質網際服務軟體。課程內容包括下列主題：一、網際服務軟體工程概論二、網際服務應用系統架構三、網際服務軟體開發程序四、網際服務軟體程序框架五、網際服務系統規劃與分析六、網際服務軟體設計七、網際服務軟體測試八、網際服務軟體管理九、元件式網際服務應用軟體開發十、服務導向式網際服務應用軟體開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with full knowledge and technologies of Web-based software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality Web-based software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.Introduction to Web-based Software Engineering2.The Structure of Web-based Systems3.The Software Process for Web-based Applications4.The General Process Framework for Web-based Applications5.Formulating and Analyzing Web-based Systems6.Design of Web-based Applications7.Testing of Web-based Applications8.Management Issues of Web-based Applications9.Component-Based Web Application Development Approach10.Service-Oriented Web Application Development Approach

description.zh: 嵌入式系統目前愈來愈普遍。它將會大大地影響我們的生活方式。可攜式裝置如智慧型手機(smart phone), 掌上型電腦(PDA),以及所謂的IA裝置如家用網路閘道器(home gateway)、數位視訊錄影機(DVR), 和常見的遊戲机(game machine) 都是屬於嵌入式系統的範疇。	在本課程中,我們將會由基礎介紹何謂嵌入式系統、嵌入式系統的形式、以及如何建構一個嵌入式系統。由於嵌入式系統包含硬體及軟體的議題，我們也會探討相關的主題。	本課程的先修課程包含計算機組織與結構、C程式語言、資料結構、系統程式、以及作業系統。課程主要內容如下：1.嵌入式系統簡介2.基礎概念3.硬體支援4.精簡指令集結構5.開發環境與工具集6.系統啟動初始作業7.系統核心8.檔案系統9.裝置操作10.應用程式開發11.除錯本課程亦包含學期專題作業。
description.en: Embedded systems are more and more popular today. It will affect the human life greatly. Portable devices like smart phone, PDA, and MP3 player, and so-called IA devices such as home gateway, DVR, and game machine are all categorized as embedded systems.	In this course, we will introduce from scratch that what an embedded system is, what it looks like, and how to build an embedded devices. Since an embedded system involves hardware and software issues, we will discuss the related subjects. 	The prerequisite courses for this class include computer organization and architecture, C programming language, data structure, system programming, and operating system. The major topics of this course are listed as follows:1.Introduction2.Basic Concepts3.Hardware Support4.RISC Embedded Architecture5.Development Environment and Tool Chain6.Boot loader7.OS Kernel8.File System9.Device Manipulation10.Application Development11.DebuggingA term project will be conducted in this course.

description.zh: 討論有關如何透過包裝之展示效果以刺激購買力，展現造形美並研究印刷、產品特性之表達及色彩計劃以提高商品價值感。
description.en: The aim of this course is to familiarize the syudents with the basic concept and technology of industrial packaging,commercial packaging and packaging management and to train them in the technique of package design and managment so that they may continue their advanced or apply what they learn to practice.

description.zh: 前言: 本課程主要為介紹現今主要名家與重要學派之設計理念與其實踐狀況，授課採講演與研討方式進行。內容: 瞭解設計相關理論與方法。 瞭解設計之方法與課題。 瞭解設計研究之寫作與閱讀方法。 方式: 由授課老師依不同時期，介紹所屬領域之理論、方法及參考文獻。授課方式，採講義、討論、參觀及邀請演講等方式綜合進行。為
description.en: he content of this course is to introduce the design philosophy and implementing skills of contemporary noted architects and major schools. This course will be carried on by lecturing and seminar.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生個人軟體程序的概念與技術，幫助學生建立相關的技能以提升其開發軟體的能力。透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生學習軟體專案計畫、追蹤、測量、與分析等方法，並學習如何使用這些方法來改善個人軟體開發的效能。課程內容包括下列主題：一、個人軟體程序策略二、個人軟體程序基準三、計劃I - 計劃的流程四、計劃II - 軟體規模測量五、計劃III - 軟體規模估算六、計劃IV - 資源與時程估算七、個人軟體程序測量八、設計與程式碼檢驗九、個人軟體程序擴展十、個人軟體程序應用
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	The objective of this course is to introduce the concepts and technologies of personal software process and help students build the skills required for doing better development work. In particular, students will learn comprehensive planning, tracking, measuring, and analysis methods and learn how to use these techniques to improve their personal performance in developing software projects. The course will cover the following topics: 1.The Personal Software Process Strategy 2.The Baseline Personal Process 3.Planning I - The Planning Process 4.Planning II - Measuring Software Size 5.Planning III - Estimating Software Size 6.Planning IV - Resources and Schedules Estimating7.Measurements in the Personal Software Process 8.Design and Code Reviews9.Scaling Up the Personal Software Process10.Using the Personal Software Process

description.zh: 知識經濟時代「創新研發」已成為產業最重要的競爭力之一，配合此一趨勢的發展，政府積極招攬國外企業來台設立創新研發中心，同時鼓勵本國企業在台設立創新研發總部，企圖使台灣成為企業的全球研發中心，支援企業從事全球佈局活動所需之技術能力，並使研發服務業成為台灣的重要產業。因此，產品研發管理人才已成為企業最重要的幹部。本所之產品研發管理教授課程包含: 新產品開發流程、品質機能展開、DFM-設計易製化、6 σ設計、田口品質工程、產品資料管理(PDM)、產品開發協同設計與智慧財產權專利申請製作等主題。
description.en: To meet the trends of innovation and ODM for industries in Taiwan, the knowledge of Product R&D Management for IE field is crucial more than ever. Therefore, the course of Product R&D Management includes new product development process, Quality Function Deployment (QFD), Design for manufacturability (DFM), Six sigma and Design for Six sigma, Taguchi Method, Product Data Management (PDM), Collaborative product commerce and Patent Editing.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路與品牌策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與品牌策略的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路與品牌策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路與品牌策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路行為，通路策略及品牌功能，品牌權益與品牌策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, brand function, and brand strategy.

description.zh: 倉儲管理課程的目的在研究供應鏈中大型倉儲的各項管理技術，以期提高大型倉儲的管理效率，降低倉儲管理成本，進而提升產業整體的競爭力，其包含下列主題:1.倉儲管理簡介2.倉儲資料剖析3.倉儲績效評估4.棧板存取系統5.小型品項檢選系統6.撿貨作業7.倉儲空間規劃8.倉儲作業電腦化9.倉儲實例研討
description.en: The warehouse management course is to study the techniques to manage large warehouses in the supply chain systems with aims to improving productivity and reducing costs.1.Warehouse management basics2.Warehouse activity profiling3.Warehouse performance measurement4.Pallet systems5.Small items picking systems6.Order picking7.Warehouse layout8.Warehouse computerization9.Application studies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討的議題包括資訊系統需求規格的制定方法，資訊系統的建置平台，所使用技術與語言的趨勢，和其效果、效率及維護成本的評估。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: The topics of this course include the documentation methods of requirement and specification for information system, the economical development workplace, the trend of new developing techniques and language, and the evaluations of maintenance and developing effect. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in information system development.

description.zh: 1.本課程為電力系統之延伸與應用 2.藉由許多方法、理論之比較來加強系統容量與短路故障的觀念 3.觀念建立後，即使藉由簡單的計算，也能正確地分析該系統 4.藉由許多工業界的實例來分析，以證明方法的實用性，有助於研究及實務。
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 1)簡介 (2)全像術原理 (3)薄全像片與厚全像片 (4)全像記錄介質(5)顯示全像 (6)電腦全像 (7) 全像術應用 (8) 全像實作
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Principle of holography (3) Thin and thick holograms (4) Recording medium (5) Display hologram (6) Computer-generated hologram (7) Applications (8) Case study

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。本課程包括黑體輻射、量子力學概念、原子能階、半導體、接合面，光之調制、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊。
description.en: Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering is one of fundamental electro-optics courses. It consists Blackbody Radiation, Quantum Mechanical Concepts, Energy Bands, Semiconductors, Junctions, Modulation of Light, Display Devices, Lasers, Photo-detectors, Fiber Optical Wave-guide and Optical Communication.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程進階課程之一。其內容包含: (1) 影像簡介; (2)影像處理基礎; (3) 影像的表達及描述; (4) 影像的轉換; (5) 影像的增強; (6) 影像的分割; (7) 影像的壓縮; (8) 影像的復原.
description.en: Image processing is one of the advanced courses in electro-optics program. The following contents are included: (1) introductions; (2) principles of digital image processing; (3) image description; (4) image transformation; (5) image enhancement; (6) image partition; (7) image compression; (8) image restoration.

description.zh: 資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用各種資料分析與預測技術，以從大型資料庫中，萃取出對產業經營與管理有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題:1.資料探勘簡介2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用3.多維資料模型4.資料預先處理技術5.關聯法則探勘6.分類與預測7.資料分群8.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The data mining course is to study the applications of modern data analysis and prediction techniques to extract useful knowledge from large databases for assisting in business management. The course covers the following topics.1.Data mining basics2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining3.Multidimensional data model4.Data preprocessing5.Association rules6.Classification and prediction7.Clustering8.Topics on data mining applications to business management

description.zh: 資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用各種資料分析與預測技術，以從大型資料庫中，萃取出對產業經營與管理有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題:1.資料探勘簡介2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用3.多維資料模型4.資料預先處理技術5.關聯法則探勘6.分類與預測7.資料分群8.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The data mining course is to study the applications of modern data analysis and prediction techniques to extract useful knowledge from large databases for assisting in business management. The course covers the following topics.1.Data mining basics2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining3.Multidimensional data model4.Data preprocessing5.Association rules6.Classification and prediction7.Clustering8.Topics on data mining applications to business management

description.zh: 本課程主要探討服務行銷的重要內容，包括顧客行為、關係行銷、行銷策略設計與服務品質模式探討及顧客滿意度研究。課程將配合實例進行討論。
description.en: This course is to discuss some important topics of service marketing:  Consumer Behavior, Relationship Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Service Quality Model and Customer Satisfaction.  The course  contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in service marketing practice.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1.傳輸線原理，2.高頻元件，3.散射參數，4.史密斯圖應用，5.小信號放大器，6.低雜訊放大器，7.射頻放大器，8.振盪器，9.混波與檢波，10.功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

description.zh: 本課程的目標是訓練有志教學工作的學生，使其能熟悉學科課程標準，準備分析及運用教材，練習教案的編製與運用，練習靈活運用教學法，教學技術，熟知學校常規，設計與指定作業以及練習教學評鑑與學習評量，使從參與行動中接觸各種實際經驗，以便畢業後能須利適應教學情境。
description.en: The object of this course is to lead the students to know how to be a good instructor with good instructional methods and skills learned from this course. For achieving this goal, this course presents the students with basic theories of instructions, makes them study from demonstration in high school and among themselves, directs them to practices the making of inst4ucting plans. After finishing this course, the students should have learned how to make sure of the standard of the subjects they are going to teach; how to prepare, analyze and skillfully use the teaching material, how to make and skillfully use the instructing plans, how to actively use instructing methods and skills, how to will know and use the school or class rules, how to design and assign exercise, how to evaluate instruction and learning. As a result, they must become good teachers in the future.

description.zh: 本課程的目標是訓練有志教學工作的學生，使其能熟悉學科課程標準，準備分析及運用教材，練習教案的編製與運用，練習靈活運用教學法，教學技術，熟知學校常規，設計與指定作業以及練習教學評鑑與學習評量，使從參與行動中接觸各種實際經驗，以便畢業後能須利適應教學情境。
description.en: The object of this course is to lead the students to know how to be a good instructor with good instructional methods and skills learned from this course. For achieving this goal, this course presents the students with basic theories of instructions, makes them study from demonstration in high school and among themselves, directs them to practices the making of inst4ucting plans. After finishing this course, the students should have learned how to make sure of the standard of the subjects they are going to teach; how to prepare, analyze and skillfully use the teaching material, how to make and skillfully use the instructing plans, how to actively use instructing methods and skills, how to will know and use the school or class rules, how to design and assign exercise, how to evaluate instruction and learning. As a result, they must become good teachers in the future.

description.zh: 科技行銷的重點在於針對現在的科技產業、產品、技術、服務等等商品、巿場作一系統的、科學的、實務的研究與探討，其主要內容含：1.何謂科技產品，2.何謂科技巿場，3.科技產品的行銷定位，4.科技行銷策略研究，5.科技產品行銷推廣與調查，6.科技技術轉移及專利行銷，7.科技產業國際行銷，8.科技行銷的新趨勢。
description.en: 1.What is technology product? 2.What is technology marketing? 3.Strategy study of technology marketing. 4.Market survey of technology product. 5.Technology transfer.  6.Patent marketing.  7.International marketing strategy, 8.Development of technology marketing.

description.zh: 課程介紹單元有包括：(1)噪音檢測指標(音壓、音功率、音強度、dB、Leq、L10、Ld 、Ln及Ldn等)之計算、(2)各種噪音種類(總音源、面音源、線音源)、(3)噪音對人體的影響(聽力損失及遮蔽作用等)、(4)噪音測定與定與評估、(5)振動之定義與測定、(6)噪音振動之控制(音源及傳播路徑的控制)等，應足以供往後更進一步之噪音防制應用、(7)防治噪音控制案例說明。
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the theory of sound propagation and transmission. The topic is including important industrial noise sources and sound measurement equipments, selection of appropriate noise criteria and control methods, noise abatement technology, laboratory studies and case histories.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主,使學生從學習過程中瞭解廢棄物4R之原理,此包括:1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術4.廢棄物生命週期之分析  5.減廢策略與管理體系.
description.en: "Waste Reduction and Recovery"is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consiste of approches and technology for waste minimitation.recovery and reuse,life cycle analysis,and management policy.

description.zh: 國內環境問題隨著工業經濟之成長及國民環境保護意識之提高而逐漸受到重視，因此如何在經濟發展與環境保護中取得平衡，即為現階段重要之環保政策。本課程旨在介紹環境政策理念之發展，環境政策之背景及實例分析我國現階段環境保護政策綱領以及我國環境政策重點等 。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the Policy for Environmental Protection.

description.zh: 課程內容包含個體經濟、總體經濟、國際貿易之基本理論與模型、我國臺灣地區經濟發展策略與展望。
description.en: Micro and macro economics, the theories and models of international trade, the economic development strategies and prospects of the Taiwan region.

description.zh: 在知識經濟時代裡，決定各企業間彼此競爭的最後勝負，不是產能、效率、更不是任何實體資產的多寡，卻是在於企業內的組織文化、人才素質與知識傳遞的能力，是否能夠比競爭對手更優秀。本課程的目的是希望讓學生對於存在組織內部與外部，及員工本身內隱及外顯之重要的知識面，做有系統的收集、創造、儲存、傳遞、分享、與利用的過程與管理。
description.en: In the times of knowledge-based economy, what a count in deciding the enterprise's success in the competition of others is not its productivity, efficiency, or not the amount of entity property, but the organization culture, manpower quality, and knowledge delivery ability.  The purpose of this curriculum hopes to let student understand how to systematically collect, create, store, deliver, share, and employ the information inside and outside the organization and the employee.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是希望學生了解創造思考的歷程與方法，並且與學校課程與教學方法相結合，以培養學生問題解決及創造思考的教學能力。
description.en: The purpose of this curriculum let the student to understand that the process and methods of creative thinking, and combine the content with curriculum and teaching in the schools.  To cultivating the teaching abilities of problem-solving and creative thinking were considered from it to educate the important target at present.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

name.zh: 資訊技術在醫學工程之應用
name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原                                         理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺                                         陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物                                         理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度                                         、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 概論，飛行器介紹，飛行空氣動力學，飛行運動方程式，穩定性與控制，旋翼空氣動力學，旋翼機控制，穩定與控制係數，各軸項之運動分析，控制響應，飛行自動控制設計與分析。
description.en: Introduction, Review of Flying Vehicles, Aerodynamics of Flight, Equations of Motion, Stability and Control, Rotor Aerodynamics, Control of Rotorcraft, Stability and Control Derivatives, Motion Analysis, Control Response, Design and Analysis of Automatic Flight System.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理、高等IC製程   探討奈米矽元件之物理模型，及物理極限之深層探討。
description.en: The study on the physics limits and physics modeling of Nano silicon device.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 建築防火避難與消防設備2. 給排水衛生化糞設備3. 升降機設備系統4. 智慧型建築概論5. 垃圾處理設備6.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the second step of a series course, its content including:1. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment2. Plumbing Equipment3. Elevator Equipment4. Introduction about Intelligent Building5. Refuse Treatment Equipment6. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生應用資訊科技來加強都市規劃與設計的能力。授課的主題涵蓋： 1. 電腦科技應用於都市規劃與設計相關領域的現況 2. 都市資訊系統的內涵及功能 3. 都市資訊系統的建構方法與工具 4. 都市資訊系統的應用實例
description.en: The course is designed to help students to utilize the power of newly developed computer technology to urban planning and design applications. The course content including: 1. Introduction of computer technology used in urban planning and design applications. 2. The content and functions of urban information system. 3. The methods and tools of constructing of urban information system. 4. Some applications of urban information system.

description.zh: 一、說明環境心理學的意義、發展背景、適用範圍及研究架構，並介紹環境心理學的方法論及在建築規劃設計上之運用；二、針對環境心理學與實質環境相關之重點課題，研討視覺美學、特性使用者活動行為模式、群居型態社交行為、空間場所性能體認等現象與實質設施需求之互動關係，並由實際案例之研討、模擬，以熟悉調查、觀察之操作。

name.en: Special topics on designing SCADA Systems

description.zh: 監控系統介紹監控系統之應用遠端資訊設備感測器與轉換器資料擷取通訊系統規劃通訊協定人機介面實例研討
description.en: Introduction to SCADA systemsApplication of SCADA systemsRemote Terminal UnitsSensors and transducersData acquisitionCommunication system planningProtocolMan-machine interfaceCase study

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。系統匯流排（匯流排之時序、匯流排之負載及驅動能力）、序列系統介面（8251可程式通信介面）、平行系統介面（8251可式程式週邊介面）、A/D &D/A 介面、系統中斷 DMA(Direct Memory Access)介面 、通訊訊號介面（RS232、RS422、電流迴路）、區域性網路（區域性網路概論、區域性網路的使用方法、區域性網路方式及目的）、區域性網路的基礎技術、通訊線路及信號、資料交換規則、匯流排網路的特性及分析。
description.en: System Bus (Bus Timing, Bus Loading, Bus Driven), Serial Communication Interfaces (8251 Programmable Communication Interfaces), Parallel Communication (8255 Programmable Peripheral Interface), A/D & D/A Interface, Interrupt System, Direct Memory Access Controllers Communication Interface (RS232, RS422, Current Loop), Local Networks (Introduction of Networks Technology, Communication Circuit and Signals, Data Switching Techniques, Network Performance & Analysis).

description.zh: 簡單直流電源製作，I/O (8255介面電路試作與測試)，各種Sensor結構與使用方法介紹，語言程式介紹，Sensor與I/O介面，步進馬達與伺服馬達控制，AD與DA轉換器，光學尺、編碼器組裝與控制，控制加工機台、精度調整。
description.en: 1. DC power supply (±5V, ±12V 或 ±15V 試作)2. I/O interface (8255 interface controller)3. Sensors 4. Structure of the programming 5. Sensor and I/O interface6. Stepping and servo motor controller 7. AD and DA converters8. Assembly and control of optical scale and encoder 9. Setup and control of the machine

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機率基本觀念及數理隨機變數、工程常用的機率分佈函數、量測數據與參數估算、迴歸及相觀分析、可靠度之分析及運用、電腦模擬(蒙地卡羅)技術。
description.en: Basic Probability, Random Variables and Probability Distributions, Sampling Distribution, Maximum LikelihoodModel Fitting, Confidence Tolerance and Prediction intervals, Regression Analysis, Introduction to Monte Carlo Methods.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。空調的基本原理、冷凍的基本循環原理，冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Pipin and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

name.en: The Introduction of Enterprise Resource Planning

description.zh: 本課程包含：企業資源規劃概論及其各模組之介紹。模組包含生產管理、財務管理、人力資源管理及專案管理。除外，並介紹目前常用之商用軟體系統及上機實習。
description.en: This course includes：the fundament of ERP and its component modules. The modules will cover production management, financial management, human resource management, and project management. Besides, the introduction of some commercial software systems and laboratory practice will also include.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 管理決策分析課程，包含主題為企業在確定情況下的決策與不確定情況下的決策分析。此課程提供大家作出良好決策程序的研究基礎。預先對機率、統計與計量分析方法的學習對此門課程是有幫助的。此課程中會描述以決策分析模型、步驟與如何形成每個決策模型步驟介紹、及再許多實務的運用情況。
description.en: Managerial Decision-Making includes the following topics: Decision Making under Certainty;  Decision Making under Uncertainty. This course provides the basis for the comprehensive study of procedures for making good decisions. A prior course in Probability, Statistics and Quantitative Analysis Methods are useful. This course presents a step-by-step procedure for decision making known as the rational model and describes how to perform each step, in detail, and illustrate their application in a variety of situations.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生就宏觀的角度，分析總體經濟環境，包括：產出、失業率、通貨膨漲率、物價、利率與匯率等。課程分別就古典學派、凱因斯學派、新古典、新凱因斯學派乃至貨幣與實質景氣循環等論戰推演比較模型之演進，並說明其政策主張。
description.en: Macroeconomics discuss economic subjects from macro view, such as output, unemployment, inflation, price, interest rate, foreign exchange rate..etc. Lectures begin with wars between Classical school and Keynesian school, and Monetarist, neo classical, new Keynesian. Finally, we discuss economic fluctuation theories of MBC and RBC, and their policy implications.

name.zh: 高速數位訊號完整設計

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線理論2.耦合3.非理想的傳輸線效應4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳5.電源供應系統6.電子電路的模擬
description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

notes: 政大陳彰儀教授(同步遠距教學)

description.zh: 本課程在介紹電腦視覺的基本概念與使用技術. 課程內容包含: 1.introduction to computer vision 2.geometric camera calibration 3.illumination 4.geometry of multiple view 5.structure from motion 6.segmentation by clustering 7.tracking models 8.model-based vision 9.image-based rendering.
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of computer vision. The outline of this course includes: 1.introduction to computer vision 2.geometric camera calibration 3.illumination 4.geometry of multiple view 5.structure from motion 6.segmentation by clustering 7.tracking models 8.model-based vision 9.image-based rendering.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討如何結合硬體建設與柔性需求的社區規劃，以創造理性生活空間。並從都市規劃設計、公共安全、社區結構過程與社區組織等不同層面聯繫建築與都市設計議題，探討社區發展問題與對策。課程內容主要包括：1.社區定義、相關理論、形成、類型、環境問題及改善策略。2.社區建設與發展之規劃主題。3.社區鄰里單元規劃、土地細分與計畫整合單元開發、國民住宅社區  規劃。4.社區管理與維護。5.社區規劃/社區營造與民眾參與。6.社區規劃與社區文化、生活品質及防災。7.社區規劃實務：實例探討。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the way of community planning is          concerned with achieving a between physical creativity and well-being of   the community and to explore the development issues and strategies to cope with. Thus the course including : 8.Definitions, theories, genesis and morphology of the community.9.Issues and strategies of community development and planning.10.Neighborhood nuit planning land subdivision and unit development planning and public housing community planning ..etc11.Management and maintenance of community.12.Community planning development and public participation.13.Community planning and culture living quality as well as public safety.14.Community planning practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對染料化學結構與化學性質對其染色性、色光以及牢度的關聯予以探討,當然也探討一些重要染料以及中間體的製備。
description.en: This course concentrates on the chemical characteristics of dyes and pigments,with emphasis on attempts to interpret their colouring and fastness properties in terms of the essential structural features of colourant molecules.Some important intermediates and their uses in the synthesis of major chromophores are also indicated.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues.  Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

name.en: The Social and Cutural Characters in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是涵括台灣社會與台灣文化兩大部份，台灣社會部份可分為早期台灣原住民社會，十七世紀以後漢人社會的建立，十九世紀從移民社會到定居社會，近代工商業社會的建立等幾部份；文化方面則以原住民文化，漢人文化及近代文化為教授重點，希望在一學期的課程中使學生對台灣的社會與文化有一概括性的了解。
description.en: This course primarily includes two major sections: Taiwan's society and Taiwan's culture.  Taiwan's society is made up of early aboriginal society, Han immigrant society after 17th century, the society of settlement in 19th century and the establishment of industrial/commercial society after 1930.  Taiwan's culture focuses on aboriginal culture, Han culture, and contemporary culture.  This one-semester course provides students with the basic knowledge about the Taiwan's society and culture in the hope that the students would have a comprehensive understanding of the culture and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

name.en: An Introduction to Chinese Cultural and Historical Relics

description.zh: 我國數千年之歷史文明，流傳下無數具有歷史、藝術及科學價值的文物，宮廷民間的收藏、考古文物的出土，即是明證。因此本課程旨在讓現代人認識、珍惜這項人類共有之文化遺產。課程採取數位教師合開方式，內容有：一、 陶瓷器：介紹陶瓷器之製作、顏色、紋飾、造型。二、 玉器：介紹玉器之玉材、雕工、沁色、形制、紋飾、用途。三、 青銅器：介紹青銅器之製作、類別、紋飾、銘文、禮器文化意涵。 四、 考古文物：介紹當代重大考古發現，呈現一代一地出土文物之全貌。
description.en: With thousands of years of history, an immense supply of historical and cultural relics, which are bestowed with historical, artistic and scientific significance, have been passed down to us. These relics are found in emperors' palaces, in private houses or by way of archeological discovery. The course is designed to help modern people understand and cherish the cultural heritage, which is supposed to be shared by all the human beings. The course is jointly directed by more than a few instructors. Some of the topics include:1. Ceramics: How are ceramics wares made? What do the colors, decorations and appearance mean?2.	Jade: What are the original materials to make jade wares? How are jade wares carved? What do the colors, decorations, forms mean? To what purpose are the jade wares made?3.	Bronze Wares: How are the bronze wares made? What categories are there in the bronze wares? What do the carvings and engravings in the service utilities mean?4. Archaic Relics: What are some of the gr

description.zh: 近百年是台灣政治、社會、經濟、文化劇烈變動的時代。從清季西洋勢力的大舉進入，清廷推動自強新政以應變；爾後台灣淪入殖民統治，在近代化及同化政策下台灣的變革更為迅速；而從台灣光復迄今，不論是經濟發展、政治民主、教育普及等等，使台灣進入已開發國家之林。這些變革與發展，是台灣民眾集體努力的總成績，但其間也有許多引領風騷的人物，他們分佈於各個不同的領域，歷史家對他們的評價或正或負，成就與貢獻的多寡也有爭議，不過透過這些人物事蹟的探討，可了解個人與群體、時代、環境的互動關係，也更能掌握近百年台灣史發展的脈絡。
description.en: Never has Taiwan experienced so big changes in politics, social structures, economics and cultural movements as in the last century. In Ching Dynasty, the Westernized power entered and the Ching court initiated innovative campaigns to work against; then Taiwan under the colonial rule by Japan, modernization  and colonialism changes Taiwan a lot ; in past half century KMT's rule has advanced such great deal in the fields of economic development, democracy and education as to stand among the developed countries. Though it is the collective efforts of the Taiwanese people that contribute to the alteration and development, there exist some of the outstanding figures in various fields, who might receive positive as well as negative comments from the historians and who might initiate a controversy concerning their contribution. This course explores the most influential individuals and the events that happen around, in the hope to understand the interaction between each of them and the groups

description.zh: 本課程是為非電影系的大專學生所設計的，希望在一個學期的課程中，能使學生對電影藝術有概括的了解。課程包括電影原理與形式美學、電影史、以及電影理論；以影片(某段時期的作品)與形式分析交互進行。上課方式為：講課、影片觀賞與討論，所觀賞的影片兼及經典與當代作品，例如：卓別林、希區考克、史匹柏、珍康萍等導演的作品。本課程的重點在原理的說明和理論的探討，使學生能以新的角度解讀電影，具有深度評析電影的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to give non-film major college students a comprehensive understanding of film within one semester.  The goal of the course is to provide a survey of some major topics in cinema studies which are organized into three sections: film production and techniques, history, and criticism and theory.  Course activities include lectures, film/video screenings, and discussions.  Not only classic but also contemporary works will be screened, such as the films of Charles Chaplin, Serger Eisesnsten, Alfred Hitchcock, Steven Spielberg, Jane Campion and David Cronenberg. Although the course will focus primarily on theory, discussion are welcome.

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en: "Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4. description.zh: 本課程將閱讀並討論西方重要之現代與後現代詩、小說、及戲劇。在第一次與第二次世界大戰期間，國際藝術運動如達達、未來、和超現實主義者，以及美國作家如費茲爵羅、歐尼爾、賀思騰等人，皆有助於定義西方文學中之現代主義脈動。第二次世界大戰之後，後現代作家如Beat詩人和紐約學派運動、劇作家貝克特、和小說作家歐康納、包德溫、和茉莉森接續現代主義而起，卻面對更複雜的美學、藝術、和精神的挑戰，本課程將討論這一系列作家和著作，以及其反映之時代精神。
description.en: This survey course examines key Modernist and Post-Modern poetry, fiction and drama from the West.  In the period between WWI and WWII, international artistic movements such as the Dadaists, the Futurists and the Surrealists, as well as American writers such as F. Scott Fitzgerald, Eugene O'Neill and Zora Neale Hurston helped to define a new Modernist impulse in Western literature; after WWII, post modern writers such as the poets of the Beat and New York School movements, playwright Samuel Beckett, and fiction writers Flannery O'Connor, James Baldwin and Toni Morrison took up where the Modernists had left off, but were faced with still more complex aesthetic, political and spiritual challenges.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
